text: Kare-ra wa arra (no gyomei) ni kakete, genshukuna chikai o tate, moshi keikoku-sha ga jibun-tachi no tokoro ni kurunaraba, don'na min yori mo rippa ni michibika rerudearou (to itte ita). Daga keikoku-sha ga kare-ra ni kuru ni oyonde, kare-ra wa masumasu (tadashi shinko kara) tozakaru bakarideari
